# CKShare.SystemFieldKey

**Enumeration**

Constants that represent the system fields of a share.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SystemFieldKey
```

## Constants

- **shareType**: The system field key for the share’s type.
- **title**: The system field key for the share’s title.
- **thumbnailImageData**: The system field key for the share’s thumbnail image data.

items.description: The system field key for the share’s type.
items.name: shareType

items.description: The system field key for the share’s title.
items.name: title

items.description: The system field key for the share’s thumbnail image data.
